评论详情: I loved these shoes. Danced for hours and they did not hurt my feet at all!! Received so many compliments.  They are good quality.

The shoes looked cute in the pictures but not as cute on your feet (a little frumpy looking) I normally wear a 7-7.5 but ordered an 8 because they said they run small. That is an understatement!!! I could barely get a foot into them!! I would doubt the even a 9 would fit comfortably enough to walk in them! Just returning. For reference I wear 7 in converse and 38 in Doc Martens
These shoes were beautiful and seemed true to size. However, the toe box was too small for my foot.
Zipper in back easy on and pretty comfortable. Hopefully they break in easily.  Perfect with my dress of the period event
Comfortable and very cute especially for the price. Easy to wear.

I love this shoe. BUT I had to return it due to my feet being odd. It was tight on my toes but if I had gone up a size it would have slipped on my heals. It is a nice shoe with good quality material. I'm so sad that my feet are weird.
I like them well enough, the colors a nice gray. Only thing is, the material is like rubber. Gives it a cheap feel.

I love these shoes. I bought them for a play I am in, and not only are they stylish and period appropriate (1936), but they are comfortable enough to be tromping around a stage for nearly 3 hours with no breaks! I know done have complained about a smell and quality, but I have not had any issues. The zipper up the back works well without creating issues for my feet, my (high) arches feel supported, and the strap does not rub. I purchased according to my EU size, which was true to size, although normally my US size would have indicated I get a size smaller. So if you know your EU size, I would go with that. Would definitely buy again (and Just might— in a different color)!
It is the right fit, color and heel.  However only worn it two times and the shoes has started to strip.  Extremely disappointed. Waste of money Can not be fixed. Has to be thrown out
Hurt my feet so much I had to remove them.
Comfortable and cute. Worked great for my daughter's wedding and can be worn for so many occasions

评论概述: True to size and don’t hurt my feet!!
评论详情: They were comfortable and didn’t hurt my feet. They are true to size. Can wear with so many things!!

I'm a true blue size 7 -I've never met a shoe of a different size that fit. However, they only had 6.5 and the recommendation caveat based on my previous buys suggested it would do. I expected it to fit a big snug but instead it was still too big for my already very wide foot. Long story short, they run large in my experience. The overall feel of the shoe is cheap, the toe box indents easily and would likely not fully recover. it's simply a great costume option but if you're going for yellow it seems like a mixed bag with this company gauging by the other reviews and pictures. I was also in need of a light soft yellow but instead mine were more lemony with a tint of green. Not as yellow as the mustard picture in the reviews. There's a review picture of the color I was hoping for but again, I think they have various shades of yellow and there's no telling which you'll receive.

评论概述: Beautiful shoe that I just had to buy
评论详情: I have had these shoes for awhile and I think they are absolutely gorgeous, but I haven't had a chance to wear them yet. I may be getting too old to wear heals anymore, but I just had to have these, just in case.
I'll have to put a lot of padding in it to make it fit, because the toe box leaves a pretty big gap between the top of the toe box and my actual foot.

Love these shoes! Very comfortable although the strap across the top of the foot is loose like other reviews indicated. This didn’t create and problems while dancing though. I bought black to go with a Great Gatsby theme but could easily purchase any of the colors because they are that cute and comfy!

评论概述: Adorable shoes - order a size larger
评论详情: I got these for a Great Gatsby Party - and because of the zipper closure in the back, I think I needed a larger size - I got a 10 and I am normally an 11
Very solid and comfortable

I have spinal stenosis and a rare back disease that only one doctor in the United States treats. I also have seizures and feet issues on my left foot. I have been unable to wear heal for 6 years. These shoes are so comfortable. I can wear them with issues. I absolutely love them!!! I bought another pair and when I get paid I’m buying another!
Very comfortable

I didn't receive a insoul with this pair so I will need one at a later time, well the shoe fits and it is a good shoe for whatever I am wearing. Be aware the foe cross strap is fake and you can see it too.

The shoe is not super comfortable, definitely not a walk around for a while shoe, but perfect for a job where you sit or for a costume. Love them. Went great with my flapper costume. Rough up the outsole so you don’t slide across the floor like I did.

They were what I wanted, but I had to send them back. They were way too big. I've ordered a half size smaller, hope they fit.

I just love these, look so cute with a vintage or goth outfit. Low heels, pretty comfortable to walk in. I had to add an arch support gel insert. They zip up the back which is a nice touch. Boyfriend called them "librarian shoes" and yeah, I could see that. Mysterious young librarian that dresses awesome, perhaps. Definitely get these. They really look great in person!
I bought 2 pair trying to get the right size to no avail.  I gave both pairs away

评论详情: I love the style and needed something quick.  I tend to have wide feet and the toe box was narrow.  I wore Them to a 1920’s mystery dinner so didn’t do much waking or dancing in them, I’m sure if I did my feet would have been killing me.

评论概述: These shoes run small. I reordered a larger size.

评论概述: Perfect for those of us with narrow feet
评论详情: As someone with narrow feet, it is always difficult to find a shoe that is both pretty and fits well. I was looking for something with a kind of retro look that was also comfortable and came across these in my search. I was so surprised when they came in and I tried them on. The fit was perfect! I do recommend wearing them a bit and breaking them in for full comfort.
Fits perfectly and feel very comfortable.

I really wanted love these.  They are cute and my style.  But after trying them on, wow are tight!  First, the zipper is a bit tough to zip, but that’s not a big deal.  You just have to deal with it.  They do smell a bit, but just like a normal shoe out of the box would.  Not complaints there.  However, the toe area looks and is super narrow!  And it is. I have a high arch and high instep, so unfortunately they have to go back.  Boo.  Cause while I love them, my feet have other ideas.
Beautiful, Cute Shoes. They were perfect for The 1920's Party I went to

I wish I didn't have to return these because they're cute as fuuhhh! But...I couldn't bare the smell. There was an overwhelming chemical smell as soon as I opened the box. Also, had a sticker with a California warning for cancer causing... yeah, I'm good.
I returned these because they were too small. Sizing is inaccurate.
Did not like how the leather was cut/sewn. I decided to return them but, since they came from China the buyer has to pay to send them back.

I've seen other reviews complain about smell on various products and never had that experience. These shoes were in the sun for about 10 minutes before I brought them in and the smell was gag-inducing - more like rotten meat than any chemicals. The zippers up the heel are a cute idea but they're on a short, unsupported curve. They don't unzip. If you manage to work it down with the use of 3 to 4 hands you don't have, it doesn't zip back up. I wear an 8.5 and ordered a 9, and when I did finally manage to get my foot in post-zipper fiasco, the shoe was significantly too short and not wide enough - the elastic holding the front band was stretched to the max. Also, the material is not as cleanly-colored as in the photo. The shoes look like blue material buffed over with matte black shoe polish. I don't know why clothing on Amazon is a hotbed of not-like-the-photo sizing nightmares, and I shouldn't be surprised but this was especially abysmal. Be kind to yourself and look for vintage heels elsewhere.
When I opened the shoe box the shoes were all smashed in in different places.  The size is small and the strap is large.  If you have a short fat foot they may fit.

评论概述: Perfect period shoes for musical costume
评论详情: I’m in a production of Cinderella and I needed some shoes to suit my costume. These were perfect and I can dance so well in them!
Dress shoe

Absolutely in love! So vintage but dresses up any outfit (and matches my one purse perfectly). My fiancé and I have four weddings this year to attend to plus our own and these shoes have been amazing through them all (especially for the floral/outdoors weddings). It’s the perfect accent to my outfits with a not too high heel. I have issues with my feet so I can’t go too high - these are absolutely perfect. I love them and am debating on wearing them on my wedding day too
I really like these shoes but there is no cushion you may need a half size smaller than you normally wear
Wore to an event for about 6 hours the first time I wore them.  Comfortable.

The shoe is really cute but at least a full size too small. I'm an 8 in every shoe and this one isn't even close, my toes were totally crammed. These shoes are also listed as having free returns, but I was not provided with a free return shipping label, but one where I have to pay shipping.
